## [1.0.0] - 2021-04-01
### Added
- Glob pattern support
- Unit Tests  
- Log version  

### Fixed
- Exception on margins larger than context of changelog
- Nil pointer exception in 'release' package

### Changed
- Refactor JavaScript wrapper

## [0.0.1] - 2021-04-01
### Added
- Glob pattern support
- Unit Tests
- Log version

### Fixed
- Exception on margins larger than context of changelog
- Nil pointer exception in 'release' package

### Changed
- Refactor JavaScript wrapper
